PROCEDURE.Code:
if exists(select * from sysobjects where type='p' and name='pro_#table_name#_mag') drop proc pro_#table_name#_mag
go
create proc pro_#table_name#_mag #pro_para# @index int as if @index=1 begin declare @count int select @count=count(*) from #table_name# where #pro_select_name# if @count=0 insert into #table_name# (#table_columes#) values(#table_columes_values#) end else if @index=2 update #table_name# set #table_columes_set# where #pro_select_key# else if @index=3 delete from #table_name# where #pro_select_key#
go
